page.title: 02A schoolboy's day
page.content: {A Day in the life of a Schoolboy** {________________________________} My name is{Christopher Baker,}I am 11 years old. This morning I got up at 07.00. I washed and had egg and sausage for breakfast. After breakfast I walked to school. The bell rang at 8.45. We said morning prayers and then did some maths. I have been doing capacity (volume) and fractions. At 10.30 we had playtime, I played football.Afterwards I did some English until lunchtime. Most children have school lunch, they cost 67 pence each.I bring sandwiches. In the afternoon we did creative activities. I am making a net. some children are spinning and weaving. At 15.00 we went home and I had baked beans on toast for tea. In the evening I helped my dad to build some shooting butts . At 21.00 I went to bed.
